title: How to change the base URL in TYPO3 - Quora

response.answer_text: Log into the TYPO3 backend, select “Template” from the left menu and then click on the “root” page of your website. If not already active, select the “Info/Edit” function from the drop down menu on the top of the right pane. If there is more than one template on that page, you need to select the “main template”, if there is only one template, the selector box will not show. Click on the “Setup” link and scroll to the very bottom of the edit window. Enter this as the last line: config.baseURL = http://www.yourdomain.com If you have an SSL certificate for the domain, replace http with https. Save the setting (save icon on the top of the right pane) and your done. RegardsJochen

you can change it by the just replacing the baseURL to new baseURL as example below config.baseUrl = http://www.myexample,com/ this will you fine in the configuration file or in root setup of the template.
